name: Delila's Gift
description: Delila's Gift is a VR Picture book created using Tilt Brush! It tells the story of a small sea creature named Delila and her struggle to understand belonging, ownership, fear, othering, and the darkness surrounding her.
minimum_requirements: OS: 8.1 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 1200 MB available space
